A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: No spoilers ! So you can read the review of just my opinion. I really enjoyed this film. Down side first\, I don’t think small children will be able to sit through the length of the film without feeling a bit like it’s a long film so keep that in mind. However\, for me I wish it was longer!! Upside time! The middle of the film gave me a lot of build for characters that I loved and love more now. The visuals did not disappoint\, it was just beautiful to watch with every scene. I for one test feel that the movie used the empire strikes back as its blueprint\, which is not a bad thing. You could see the similarities through tour and the lay out of the film\,but with that said\, this film was its own masterpiece. Using the lay out to build on its own story and characters to take us on an entire new journey that did not disappoint. If you enjoyed the last film and the original trilogy than you will be very pleased with this experience at the theater in my opinion.
